Text: Whose gonna thank you for this old shyt, you study this sylabus if you want to fail :) Hope someone posts something newer

the only 'newer' thing is 2012-2013, and it's hard-cover only, not PDF. Also you can use this set of books for self-education, and yes, you absolutely should use the newest available set of books if you're taking an exam.

So gtfo.

Thanks for the upload. However I must say that this is not a "complete" collection. C4 and C5 books seems missing. Those you can get from here (Again old)
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/5605792/CIMA_-_Fundamentals_-_C1-C2-C3-C4-C5_%28Suitable_for_Exams_in_2010

FYI: Older version means there will be trivial differences from new ones. Those dumb suckers who says 2010 is "old shit", these are 500+ pages books, not cars. Also these are free!!! So If you want new ones, go buy them for £35 each without complaining
